title: Ebro In The Morning - NBA Fans Crossing the Line + Unsanctioned Summer Jam Giveaways
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning.

In this episode, Ebro wants to give away Summer Jam tickets (49:20), Rosenberg talks about the NBA (27:40), Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (10:13, 41:15, 1:16:00). 

Did we mention that SUMMER JAM IS BACK?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
